title: Mickaël Wolski
text:
Mickaël Wolski (born 5 March 1979 in <a href="France">France</a>) is a French retired footballer who last played for <a href="Bergerac%20P%C3%A9rigord%20FC">Bergerac Périgord</a> in his home country.
Career.
Wolski started his senior career with <a href="FC%20Gueugnon">Guegnon</a> in the late 1990s. In 2005, he signed for <a href="Stockport%20County%20F.C.">Stockport County</a> in the English <a href="Football%20League%20Two">Football League Two</a>, where he made twenty-three appearances and scored two goals. After that, he played for <a href="Moulins%20Yzeure%20Foot">Moulins Yzeure Foot</a>, <a href="AC%20Arles-Avignon">AC Arles-Avignon</a>, <a href="Sporting%20Club%20Toulon">Sporting Club Toulon</a>, and <a href="Bergerac%20P%C3%A9rigord%20FC">Bergerac Périgord</a> before retiring.
